name: HUGGING SIMULATOR
description:
This game requires an Arduino-powered pillow connected to a PC able to run Processing 3.3.7.

The player has to learn how to hug correctly the pillow to earn all the hearts and win the game. Every time the player hugs in a wrong way, they lose half a heart. If they lose all the hearts, the game's over.

Winner of the Tuggurt Verdolino award for the weirdest game during Svilupparty 2018 - the gathering of Italian game developers.

I'll make available a downloadable, keyboard/gamepad controlled version with some changes in graphics in a couple of weeks.
